name: Transformasi untuk Keadilan Indonesia
headAddress: Jl. Tebet Utara II A, No 13
goal: TuK Indonesia has the purposes of promoting respect, protection and fulfilment of human rights and social justice by State and non-state actors in the fields of policies, programmes and activities of agribusiness and natural resources management.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: TuK Indonesia advocates the develpment of regulation on Sustainable Finance, both on a national, but also on an international level. As such, we follow with interest the work that is being executed by the High Level Expert Group on Sustainable Finance.
